pre_tt:
class PodcastController < ApplicationController
  def stream
    episode_f_path = params[:episode]
suffix_post:
episode = File.open(episode_f_path)
    episode_data = episode.read
    send_data episode_data, type: 'audio/mpeg', disposition: 'inline'
  end
end

pre_tt:
class ImageController < ApplicationController
  def display
    image_path = params[:img_path]
suffix_post:
image = File.open(image_path)
    image_data = image.read
    send_file image_data, type: 'image/png', disposition: 'inline'
  end
end

pre_tt:
class FileViewerController < ApplicationController
  def view
    file_name = params[:file_name]
suffix_post:
file = File.open(file_name)
    file_content = file.readlines.join(" ")
    render plain: file_content
  end
end

pre_tt:
class ReportController < ApplicationController
  def display
    report_location = params[:report]
suffix_post:
report = File.open(report_location)
    report_data = report.read
    send_data report_data, type: 'application/pdf', disposition: 'inline'
  end
end
